I currently have 42 flying hours. IÂ am a Sophomore student at Southwestern Illinois College in the Aviation Pilot Program and I am very
interested in the aviation world. I have wanted to be a pilot and be around airports and planes since I was eight years old. I am working on my
Private Pilot Certificate at Ideal Aviation. I also work at Ideal Aviation as a Line Service Technician.Â
